name: div-ccd-definitions
description: Utility to help creating CCD confing definitions
author: Hosain <hosain.alahmad@hmcts.net>

scripts.generate-json-aat: cd ccd-definition-processor && yarn install && yarn xlsx2json -D ../definitions/divorce/json -i ../definitions/divorce/xlsx/ccd-config-aat.xlsx
scripts.generate-excel-aat: cd ccd-definition-processor && yarn install && yarn json2xlsx -D ../definitions/divorce/json -o ../definitions/divorce/xlsx/ccd-config-aat.xlsx
